subject: FWD: Order #SSN5793 confirmed
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,

I’d like to purchase the VAM pro for my brakes as I feel it’ll add to the experience.

Is it possible to add 1x VAM pro + power supply + and mounting brackets to my existing order (SSN5793) and include the CRSM30 discount code I used?

This would be amazing because then I avoid paying for shipping twice.

Please let me know, I’d appreciate the assistance.

Kind regards,
Marios

Date: 5 Jan 2026 at 23:43
From: service@simsonn.com
To: timdejong@tutamail.com
Subject: Order #SSN5793 confirmed
